scripts.preinstall: node -e "!process.env.npm_config_user_agent.startsWith('pnpm/') && !console.log('Use pnpm install to install dependencies in this repository\n') && process.exit(1)"
scripts.reset:all: rm -Rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm run reset
scripts.reset: rm -Rf prisma2/* migrate/* prisma-client-js/* && cd prisma2/ && git reset --hard && cd ../migrate && git reset --hard && cd ../prisma-client-js && git reset --hard && echo 'Reset done! run `pnpm i && pnpm run setup`'
scripts.download: pnpm --prefix=./prisma-client-js/packages/engine-core/ run download && pnpm --prefix=./prisma-client-js/packages/photon/ run download && pnpm --prefix=./prisma2/cli/sdk/ run download && pnpm --prefix=./migrate/ run download
